# 六壬开悟录

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/liuren-kaiwulu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/liuren-kaiwulu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install liuren-kaiwulu
liuren-kaiwulu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g liuren-kaiwulu
liuren-kaiwulu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
